newsitem.title: USA: FTP sees Q1 oper loss $9-$11 million.
newsitem.headline: FTP sees Q1 oper loss $9-$11 million.

text.p: FTP Software Inc said Monday it expects a first quarter loss from continuing operations of $9-$11 million, on revenues of $21-$23 million.
The company said the expected revenue range falls below its goals.
FTP said it generated lower than expected sales volumes with its IPX/IP gateway products.
